project.name: |-- 008-testing-lambdas
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + peek + lambdas unit testing
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to perform tests involving lambdas.
PointTest: Several junit test cases including lambdas and function fields.
FilterTest: Several junit test cases including functions that accept functions.
DebuggingRunner: A runner than includes crafted errors to have a look at the stack traces.
PeekRunner: Illustrates the use of the peek() method to have a look at the elements as they are being processed by a pipeline stream.
